row.Docu: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.

row.process: !---------------------Logging Connection Details------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server IP or DNS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_SERVER_IP#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Protocol" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PROTOCOL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
